description: Resolver returns inbound_email when ticket.email_metadata is present
Resolver keeps inbound_email precedence even when creator is a client user
Resolver maps explicit source=client_portal to client_portal origin
Resolver maps explicit source=email to inbound_email origin
Resolver maps explicit source=web_app to internal origin
Resolver maps explicit source=api to internal origin
Resolver returns client_portal when creator user_type is client and no email signal exists
Resolver returns internal when creator user_type is internal and no email signal exists
Resolver returns internal when creator information is missing
Resolver handles unknown source values safely and falls back to internal
Type-level check enforces TicketOrigin union values only
MSP getTicketById response includes derived ticket_origin
MSP getTicketById classifies inbound_email when email_metadata exists
MSP getTicketById classifies client_portal when creator is a client user
MSP getTicketById classifies internal for unresolved records
Client portal getClientTicketDetails response includes derived ticket_origin
Client portal getClientTicketDetails classifies inbound_email when email_metadata exists
Client portal getClientTicketDetails classifies client_portal when creator is client user
Client portal getClientTicketDetails classifies internal for unresolved records
TicketOriginBadge renders internal variant with expected label and data attribute
TicketOriginBadge renders client_portal variant with expected label and data attribute
TicketOriginBadge renders inbound_email variant with expected label and data attribute
TicketOriginBadge supports size/className props used by both TicketDetails views
MSP TicketDetails renders ticket origin badge when origin is inbound_email
MSP TicketDetails renders ticket origin badge when origin is client_portal
MSP TicketDetails renders internal badge fallback for unresolved/legacy records
Client portal TicketDetails renders origin badge when origin is inbound_email
Client portal TicketDetails renders origin badge when origin is client_portal
Client portal TicketDetails renders internal badge fallback for unresolved/legacy records
English common locale includes ticket origin label keys
English clientPortal locale includes ticket origin label keys
CommentItem ResponseSourceBadge behavior remains unchanged after ticket-origin badge changes
ResponseStateBadge behavior in both TicketDetails views remains unchanged after origin badge insertion
No new migration is required for MVP; feature works with existing ticket/user fields
End-to-end sanity: new MSP-created ticket displays internal origin badge
End-to-end sanity: new client-portal-created ticket displays client_portal badge
End-to-end sanity: new inbound-email-created ticket displays inbound_email badge
